question:
What is the maximum number of advanced standing credits a first-year CAS student can receive?
A. 64
B. 128
C. 32
D. 16

What minimum grade is required for transfer credits to be accepted at CAS?
A. D
B. Pass
C. C
D. B

Which score is required on AP Biology to satisfy both Physical and Life Science Core requirements?
A. 3
B. 4
C. 5
D. 2

What is the minimum AP score required to receive credit for Calculus AB?
A. 3
B. 2
C. 5
D. 4

What is the minimum IB HL score accepted for CAS credit?
A. 5
B. 6
C. 4
D. 7

Which of the following is NOT accepted for advanced standing credit at CAS?
A. A-Level
B. AP
C. IB SL
D. IB HL

How many credits does a student receive for an A-Level course with a grade of B?
A. 4
B. 6
C. 8
D. 10

What type of courses are not eligible for AP credit at CAS?
A. English Literature
B. Studio Art
C. Psychology
D. History

Which AP exam can exempt students from the Quantitative Reasoning requirement?
A. Physics 1
B. Calculus AB
C. Environmental Science
D. Art History

Who reviews non-AP/IB examination credit equivalency for maturity certificates?
A. Registrar
B. Dean of Admissions
C. College Advising Center
D. Academic Department

Which AP score is needed on AP Physics C—Mechanics to get PHYS-UA 11 equivalency?
A. 3
B. 2
C. 4
D. None

How many points does an IB HL Psychology score of 7 earn?
A. 6
B. 4
C. 8
D. None

How does NYU CAS treat AP English Language for credit purposes?
A. Grants elective credit
B. No credit awarded
C. Exempts Writing I
D. Transfers as WREX-UF 101

How many AP points can be counted toward the CAS Politics major?
A. 0
B. 4
C. 8
D. 12

What is the prerequisite SAT Math score for enrolling in MATH-UA 121?
A. 600
B. 670
C. 710
D. 720

Which of the following does NOT satisfy the Core Foreign Language requirement?
A. AP French with 4
B. IB HL Spanish B with 6
C. A-Level German with B
D. SAT Subject Test in English

What is the required minimum grade for A-Level exams to earn credit?
A. A
B. C
C. D
D. B

Which AP exam awards 8 credits and satisfies both BIOL-UA 11 and 12?
A. Chemistry
B. Physics C
C. Biology
D. Statistics

To transfer to CAS, courses must have been completed within how many years?
A. 5
B. 10
C. 7
D. 15
